description: Great for solving equations with units, it's very nice to get that sanity check when it outputs the unit you were expecting.
Very handu way to enter complex formulae via the graphical interface.

Oh my GOD this is the one. You can view in duodecimal, you can calculate for multiple variables, determine particle mass in u, insert Omega's Constant.

I can guarentee you that if literally any mathmetician you can think of, if they had this program, we'd be communicating right now via telepathy. The power that this has is astronomical if you know how to use it.
I use this app in the university to solve typical problems of electronics engineering, is great because it knows a lot of units for this topic and conversions.

I use this application for solving linear regression problems.
very nice!
Awesome. Just awesome.
It can even solves integration!
Love it. It's really complete (plotting, matrices, it solve equations...) and even has a RPN mode!
Efficient, function-rich, well designed calculator with surprising depth of capability. Well worth the time for students or professionals.
So powerful and so simple to use
One of the best calculators out there.
I just think its not very intuitive, sometimes it is just faster to search google
Download the other version, "Qalculate!: The ultimate desktop calculator."
This calculator is very helpful and more powerful than MATE, GNOME calculators, and Kcalc. Possibility integrate expression and choice any base of number - cool feature!

Easy to use, lightweight, I calculated integrals really easily.

That is Math, Science, and programming skill put to serve the FOSS community and GNU/Linux.
Thank you!
summary: Highly recommended! Bravo! to the Developer(s)!

description:
100/100
Updated libraries would be good however, official release is already on 3.20
summary: Finally a calculator that doesn't suck

description:
Very powerful and easy to use calculator for those not ready for complex tools like Octave or Matlab.

It even have a periodic table built in ?️
Very good although it doesn't inherit system theme
I remember this was discontinued a while back but its nice to see its back. Great job to everyone involved, you made a lot of people's life easier
How in the world is a calculator almost a gig?
It's simply better than other options
Easy to use and feature-rich

Does so many things, and does them well (e.g. calculation error handling). Full of various functions. Maybe too many features (e.g. periodic table, roman numerals). Has programmer-friendly tools such as an IEEE 754 utility, a number base converter/viewer, and support for data units. Does neat things like support base-[you choose] numbers!
Qalculate failed to open for a while, until I reinstalled it. Still, a *lot* of "Fontconfig" errors and warnings about fonts head to stderr ☹
Qalculate is, for a calculator, slow to open.
I like the Minimal Window feature! (Ctrl+Space). I like the interface — minimal if you need it, simple if you don't. Having the textual interface (`qalculate.qalc`) is appreciated! It doesn't seem to be just an afterthought – it has command completion, colors, etc!
I wish, however, that things like calculator apps wouldn't do activist things like display the Ukrainian flag. Even though it's a good cause. It could open a can of worms. ethan@golemwire.com

Using the flatpak on Ubuntu. 
This is a seriously well engineered calculator that hasn't met a feature it doesn't like. Despite that, the user-interface is not overwhelming.
Excelente app, un detalle que observé es en la conversión de tiempo (segundos, minutos y horas), arrojando resultados en ciertas operaciones decimales.

Application très puissante, notamment pour les applications numériques en physique.

La propagation des incertitudes est infiniment utile, de même que l'analyse dimensionnelle (qui évite bien des erreurs). J'ai malheureusement encore un peu de mal avec les graphiques, mais je finirai bien par comprendre
На любом линуксе устанавливаю этот кальк из-за прекрсной возможности менять выражение
Функций много НО кто-то очень умный решил что хорошей идеей будет добавить полит нотку в него.
